website_summaries.verdict: The Yamaha YAS-209 is a worthy smart sound bar that offers excellent sound quality, whether it's playing music or movies.
pros: The Yamaha YAS-209 offers excellent sound quality in a compact sound bar
The addition of Amazon Alexa is useful and the mics work well in loud environments
The sound bar's implementation of DTS Virtual:X offers a rich surround effect
The subwoofer is more articulate and offers more headroom than the competing Polk sound bar
cons: There's no onscreen display and the LEDs on the top are too small to see from your chair

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking at the 207 but this has the WiFi and Alexa. Could not be happier. The surround is phenomenal and blew my LG away. Love this baby!!
customer_reviews.author: BigBoy51

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a ton of these sound bar woofer combinations....this one is excellent! And yes, the Alexa voice control really works well! I have used it now for several months and the "voice" setting that helps emphasize the dialogue in a movie so you can hear it without getting blasted during action scenes is well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Drkoopman

customer_reviews.title: DTX doesn't live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: This is a good 2 channel system. Yamaha has some gimmick implying that you can get near surround sound quality. It really doesn't measure up. The sound front is wider than normal, but just by a bit. If you want a surround sound system, you would be better off paying the extra bucks to get the rear speakers. Also, the top firing sound on this system is weak. If you want this feature you should purchase a soundbar that ha top firing drivers and not just holes pointed up. would I purchase again...NO Is it a good value...probably yes, since it does give good 2 channel sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ben

customer_reviews.title: Major upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from the old Sony bar that had suddenly croaked on me. As I age the problem of voice recognition on shows is increasing to where some things are just unintelligible. This fixed that problem to a great extent. Perfect?...no, but much improved. The jury is still out on the “surround sound” mode. It works well in some cases & others not so much. The sub works just fine & installation was a snap. If you accept the fact that this is not a complete surround sound system & that’s it’s simply a soundbar your expectations will be met. Mine are. It’s simply everything I needed it to be in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: 76 year-old can now hear the TV!
customer_reviews.text: "What'd he say," was a common refrain in my house, said to my wife who doesn't have any hearing issues as a young lass of 68. My hearing is marginal, the Yamaha sound bar solves the problem. Getting Alexa working is not yet complete but I'm working on it. The TV costs as much as a heart transplant but the built-in sound system is tin and cheap. The Yamaha makes me feel like a young kid of 68!
customer_reviews.author: George Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer for a big flat screen tv. I love having a huge, flat tv..but I've noticed these types of TV's have great picture quality, but awful sound quality. This sound bar system has changed that for us. For the xbox it is just amazing sound quality now. And, with movies..we no longer deal with "what did they say?"..the music is loud but the voices are low..now we can actually understand them almost like theater quality.
customer_reviews.author: April B

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this soundbar. Based on reviews and the Yamaha name, I decided to buy and expect that it's way better than my very old sony bar and sub. Boy was I wrong. I did the firmware update after downloading the app. Its loud after update but there is seriously almost no bass from this system. I played with every setting but nothing helped. The size and weight of the sub lead me to believe it was going to give a great bass response. Threw everything right back in the box and will be shipping it back. If you like a rumble during a movie, this isn't for you
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hammermeister

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very mediocre. The midrange is missing a lot of range. Upper ranges are ok. You have to constantly change the equalizer settings because if you were listening to music and then switch to a documentary, there is an echo with the voice. But, the worst thing about it is that it would stop working after an hour or two. I re-installed it multiple times and it woudl fix the problem for a short period. Tried to contact Yamaha support, but they are only open while I'm at work. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Open packaging, but great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar and sub are great. The low rating is for the packaging being open. This appears to be refurbished or a returned speaker. I wouldn’t know but I paid for new. Things like this make me not want to buy from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan H

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, awesome package for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good for the price. Vocals are clear and each setting for the sound profile does its job nicely. Listening to music is enjoyable, but the soundbar really thrives in movies. Very easy to use with the HDMI arc, perfect integration with my Samsung tv. Alexa integration is pretty rough, the mic doesn't always pick up and playback doesn't always work. Overall though, great soundbar, very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: Reviews said it was very well integrated with Alexa, not quite
customer_reviews.text: I put my Echo in a different location thinking this would replace it. It really doesn't. When you are listening to music or watching TV, the Alexa response is terrible, even when using the Alexa button on the remote. Still, we have an LG TV with terrible speakers and we like the soundbar for watching TV or streaming Pandora. UPDATE 06/2020- I would not buy this again. Better than the LG speakers? Yes. A good interface with Amazon? Absolutely not. I recommend you stay away from this if Alexa functionality is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Sound WAS good...but then disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Read an article rating the top sound bars which listed this unit. I had the unit installed for just under 4 months to run TV sound and music. The initial disappointment was that other Alexa speakers were not compatible with this unit for house wide sound. Our speaker then started a static sound out of the left side 1 week ago which makes it unbearable to listen to and worsened over the last week. The $300 speaker has become just an expensive paper weight. I reached out to the company who refused to replace the product. So although the initial sound was great, the product and service was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: OhBilly888

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I can not get alexa to work. I also thought it would integrate with my echos but it does not, my fault for not reading carefully. It has issus where the sound bar stops working. You need to download the app to make it work initially which is a way for them to harvest your information. For the price I am not impressed. A sound bar with alexa was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: laurance kenny

customer_reviews.title: Superb Budget soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on soundbars before I settled on this one. For a bedroom, I feel that the soundbar is incredible. the sound feels as though it surrounds you instead of just coming straight at you. The different sound features really make a difference from the movie - tv and even clear voice. If the struggle to hear the dialogue of the characters in those quiet moments of the scene clear voice is perfect for you
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Better than the stock tv speakers by far. The sound is great but there are regular dropouts of sound for several seconds . The auto on feature works intermittently even after setup through my OLED C9. I still love the sound bar because the sub is outstanding. Hopefully the other issues can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Lashman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, excellent price, poor app!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding sound bar , especially when considering the price. Unfortunately, the only way to connect to WiFi (and consequently Alexa) is through Yamaha's app, which does not work! I spent several hours trying to work around this to no avail. I kept it because it sounds great... but am concerned I cannot get firmware updates or utilize the full capabilities do to the inability to connect to our network. This is easily fixable on Yamaha's end, not sure why this problem exists (web search reveals it's been a problem for some time).
customer_reviews.author: jc502

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: There is a significant delay with Alexa. After we connected this to our TV the sound suddenly gets garbled and electronic and we need to disconnect the bar to hear sound. Once we installed the sound bar the TV scrolling also became delayed. We've only had this a couple of months and have had so many issues with it. The sound quality is fine but doesn't work well in conjunction with other products that you would want to hook it up to for sound (like a TV or Alexa). Also, it is not able to do the "drop in" feature on Alexa like the Echo speaker can.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Good choice if you find a right deal.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is ok. Good option if you tight on space and have not big room. Alexa is quite disappointing : you can ask s about some information and it will answer, but for example, if you ask to turn on conneced TV- it will be just too much. The app just terrible. I bought it on Amazon Warehouse as used with big discount. So, considering the price it's good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoly K

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is fine.
customer_reviews.text: I read many good reviews on this product, that is why I purchased it. I was looking for a fuller sound and will have to increase my budget to get the sound I am looking for. Otherwise it is a fine speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sound Bar Is Slow to Turn On
customer_reviews.text: When launching the TV, the sound bar is slow to start - sometimes a 30+ second lag. Not sure how to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: ceci

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this sound bar. I am a senior and find it very easy to use. The clear voice feature is great for tv. Love Alexa feature. Only negative is the tiny indicator lights. Hard to see from seating.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E

customer_reviews.title: I would consider other sound bars
customer_reviews.text: Connecting to the right audio source can be finicky. I am unable to use hdmi arc for some reason so I’m forced to use optical. The WiFi also likes to frequently disconnect itself and then be very difficult to reconnect, and the sound bar doesn’t seem to want to allow me to use the option to directly connect to my modem with an Ethernet cable. The Alexa voice recognition is also worse than a typical Alexa dot, working about 1/3 of the time, often forcing me to repeat. On the occasions it decides to work, the sound output is actually quite good.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I looked at every sound bar on the market and this seemed to be the best option for us, and it had great reviews. Wish I’d bought something else! It frequently does not turn on with the TV, so you have to manually do that about half the time - this is just aggravating. If you pause a show for more than a couple minutes, it shuts off, so you have to restart it. All of the indicators are on TOP of the unit. Not very helpful when you mount it above the TV, above the fireplace. Sound is OK, not great. I would not recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: tmd1

customer_reviews.title: Lower cost than most sound bar and good sound
customer_reviews.text: I was not totally blown away with this sound bar - I'm not too impressed with the 'Rich' bass has it said it had, there is bass, but you have to place it to maximum setting to get the bass. It is better than other in the same price range. Was not and still not ready to dump over $300 for a sound bar only to find it sucks. I got what I paid for and I dont watch that much TV to pay more, for a casual TV watcher - better than the sound from the flat screen!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this is one of the best soundbars you can get for the money. Especially if you can get it on sale and save $50. True to historic Yamaha fashion, the sound and build quality are impeccable. I also think that Alexa integration is a must for any soundbar going forward. I would absolutely buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Dhoff

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but constantly disconnects from my tv which is extremely annoying!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Correa

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work and support doesn't respond on line or by phone
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work and support doesn't respond on line or by phone. Yamaha used to be reliable. No longer. Don't waste your time trying to get any feedback "besides we are really busy, try again." And, when you do get through, they say they will call back, but don't.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lobel

customer_reviews.title: Good for a little bit then dies...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this product to support the new tv I purchased for our new home. Upon arrival everything was fine, sound quality didn't quite meet my expectation but it did the job. Unfortunately, after 3 month of light use it began to turn off intermittently and then quit working all together. I reached out to the manufacturer and got no support. Its unfortunate because all of my receivers have been yamaha and I have had a good experience. For this however I would advise to stay away as this is one of those too good to be true moments...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This set was recommended by consumer reports and has been great. Easy to use and was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dessie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the sound will drop out, but only for a few seconds . I will have to check the cable. Very happy with this soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: Sound trouble
customer_reviews.text: Sounds was fantastic however it started to chop off and became annoying while trying to listen to details I never tried Alexa I would have given it a five stars and kept it if it didn’t give me troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Sondos

customer_reviews.title: For the most part Good
customer_reviews.text: Alexa has a hard time. Sure isn’t like my echo. Now the sound bar is very good. Only issue there is that the sound bar Just switches back to TV speakers for no reason. Bottom line Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Gust Kostalas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost a week now and I love it! The sound quality is great and the Alexa integration is awesome. It has great base when playing music and works great with my TV. I definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kelly knapik

customer_reviews.title: Get a sound bar or Alexa not a combo
customer_reviews.text: When everything stays in synch, all good. But rarely does the soundbar stay in synch with my TV and then getting them to reconnect were the remotes all work as I wanted is rare. My suggestion, don't buy a combination unit like this.
customer_reviews.author: Darren H

customer_reviews.title: Very clean sound
customer_reviews.text: Using with 42" vizio tv as a computer monitor, gaming, work, movies, etc. Very clean, detailed sound, fills my small office very well. I prefer the 'game' sound setting, gives more 3d ish space...quite nice actually. Mounted the bar on top of the tv, sounds better above than below especially wen sitting 3ft from it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Design and audio is never synced between sources
customer_reviews.text: HDMI ARC is the only way to use this soundbar. You cannot successfully plug anything into the way the HDMI is setup. I finally ordered some HDMI extensions and everything seems to work now. It would be nice if they gave more thought to people who are wall mounting it. You have to use low quality HDMI cables with the way it's designed.
customer_reviews.author: usern4me

customer_reviews.title: It rose to the occassion
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for his frat room and house for next year. He wanted BOSE which was over 3 x the price. My brother recommended this (has one already in workout room) great sound already has amplifier all in one and has Bluetooth capability. It’s Yamaha it has awesome sound and What an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Lesha Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Unit.
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously a great sound bar. I installed the same under a 135 inch projection screen in hopes it would generate sufficient high quality sound with great bass to avoid using many speakers, amp, etc. This sound bar totally filled the need. For a sound bar with wireless subwoofer it’s a 10 star!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie S.

customer_reviews.title: Setting up was little bit challanging
customer_reviews.text: Hello, We had to Zoom with our younger son to finish the set up. Not because we are old but our TV is old and it did not have HDMI ARC but a regular HDMI. We had to use optic sounds c cable (included). We love the Clear Voice setting. We do not need to raise the volume is high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonka

customer_reviews.title: Sounds seems good, but Alexa blinking
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. There is a brief pause as the device switches from the TV speakers to the sound bar; showed how good it sounds. I have connected it to Alexa, but the Alexa light confines to blink white and red and I find no explanation online to explain what is going on
customer_reviews.author: Nosey Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, sounds good And clear but limited volume
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, clear, easy to set up and connect, bought for our small living room however it just doesn’t seem loud enough, may add some wireless speakers in addition to this or move to another room/tv.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Annoying audio lag with Amazon fire cube
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up via HDMI Arc and followed all instructions. Huge lag on YouTube and YouTube tv. Noticed this right away as my old soundbar had no issues. Good on Amazon for taking this back. Don't know if I got a bad bar or if this is a problem for all.
customer_reviews.author: Mendez Family

customer_reviews.title: Look at the 207 if you dont need an Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: A really good speaker for the price. The Alexa biult in is rather horable compared to an actual Alexa. If you have an Alexa I would say get the 207 instead it will It auto turns off when you have your movie paused for too long (super annoying)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the $
customer_reviews.text: Loving this. Wish I changed over Alitalia more automatically and stayed on. Times out and off if you leave or pause a movie or Netflix for more than 5 minutes. Great bang for the buck and sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: The sound coming from the bar itself it's great. Really hits most of the range when watching TV shows or movies. Music comes through great as well. The subwoofer could have a little more bass to it. Some movies that have those low undertones and rumble in them aren't able to give that sound off as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and awesome sound. The only negative so far is that when connected to Alexa, I don’t see timers, songs that are playing, etc. I need to troubleshoot to see if there is a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Sou d is good, remote is almost useless, lights are located on top bar so you have to be hovering over it to see anything. The wifi Alexa hook up is laughable at best. I labored over it for four days, finally contacted Yamaha who took a message and contacted me two days later. Tech walked me through it in about 5 minutes. Instructions that come with unit are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My first soundbar. I chose Yamaha because I had one of their surround sound systems earlier. It does not disappoint. Crisp sound with a subwoofer that can shake the house. Easy to install and connect (Xbox, TV and Bluetooth done...have not done Alexa).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a great purchase. I give it four stars not for the quality of sound but because the item came scratched. The sound is great and really enhances anything I am watching on tv or the music I am listening to. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: The D-List

customer_reviews.title: Serious issues with this soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Alexa only works about 25% of the time. The soundbar constantly needs reset. The app is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of the bar is Ok, I use it for gaming so I really like the subwoofer for that. It was extremely easy to set up. Subwoofer is wireless and already paired with the bar. I ran my xbox hdmi out to the hdmi in on the bar, then hdmi out from the bar to my screen. It "just worked" as soon as I turned everything on. Get this if you want better sound than your basic tv speakers. (Particularly the subwoofer) Do not expect to get $3000 sound from a $300 product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with app syncing to soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I could not get the app it said to download on my phone or ipad to actually sync to the soundbar after I downloaded them. I tried both methods in the instructions many many times over multiple days then just gave up. It is tied to wifi so Alexa works at least. Each time I tried to sync it would become unconnected to wifi for a period of time then reconnect on its own. I find the sound average but good enough for my purposes at this price point. Not sure what I am missing since the app wont connect though.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The soundbar was easy to hook up and sound terrific. The seller described it "used, like new". It looks and performs absolutely new! The price was great, communication with the seller was excellent and shipping coast to coast was very quick. 5 stars on the product. 5 stars for the seller!
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: Definitely yes I would recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds super easy set up perfect for apartment or room it really fils with sound and bass. I really believe this is the best choice you are going for a sound bar and not a full set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kylo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and value!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this sound bar. It has more volume than expected from a unit this size and the base control is great for balancing. I’d buy it again if I needed another sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Martin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 3 times and its less than a month old.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was at best just ok however this thing has completely stopped working three times and its less than a month old. I'll be contacting Yamaha tomorrow 1/6/2020 to see about a return or replacement I'll also be contacting Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, lights on top are hard to see.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great for this, but the lights are on top to tell you what setting it is on, which is quite annoying as it is mounted above our fireplace with the television. The app is almost user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Maybury

customer_reviews.title: No real subwoofer nor thought in design.
customer_reviews.text: I have another soundbar that was a third of the cost that blows the one away. The YAS-209 subwoofer is barely audible without high volume. Also, the indicator lights are oddly placed on the top, so they are not visible from a sitting position. If you have a soundbar and love it for the subwoofer, don't buy this model! Yes, I have done the firmware upgrade as well as downloading the app. It is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but rarely works right.
customer_reviews.text: This has been nothing but problematic since day 1. I am extremely proficient with technology, but this thing continuously has to powered off and on in order to to play audio from my smart TV direct connect, Alexa does not wake up, and I have to reboot the device almost daily. Sound quality when it's working is great, but it's extremely frustrating. I'm giving it away and going to try the Sonos system.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Alexa works great with sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girl friend and she loves it. Once she gets home, she says "Alexa, play ...." and it starts playing. Really nice setup
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Small issues but great sound
customer_reviews.text: We love it except for the fact that Alexa randomly goes off and there’s no volume number or bar on the screen. Otherwise sound quality it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Better than tv speakers but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is just "ok". Wasn't really expecting too much based on what I've heard and read about sound bars. Previously had a full blown sound system hooked up to my TV but we downsized and didn't really have room for all the components and speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Hemmig

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic performance. One negative: lights not visible from seated viewing position.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Millard

customer_reviews.title: Superior Sound Quality and Excellent Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Set was as easy as plug and play get. The sound Quality is amazing. The subwoofer in the far corner is the trick to amazing bass and sound.
customer_reviews.author: terrie moore

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha 👍
customer_reviews.text: It sounds good and it was easy to hook up ! I would refer it to someone looking for a good sound bar
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar does not integrate with Dish TV remote
customer_reviews.text: Tried about 10 different codes to integrate Soundbar with Dish TV remote. Called Yamaha and they said that is a Dish problem. Called Dish and they said that's a Yamaha problem. So typical these days. Thanks Microsoft for originating the concept of "let the customer de-bug the thing."
customer_reviews.author: MilVet

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good. Alexa helpful.
customer_reviews.text: It performs as expected. With built-in Alexa, I am able to play Amazon Prime music directly on it for better sound performance than on my Amazon Echo.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. Great sound in a tidy package.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Oldach

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Horrible Alexa!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this item. if you want to use it with Alexa and a TV. There is no command to change the input on the sound bar. I have to use the supplied remote or walk to the soundbar. I wish that I could return it. Regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Woodlandsguy1

customer_reviews.title: Failed 9 days after 90 day return window
customer_reviews.text: The sound was ok, but the app to connect to Alexa doesn’t work on IOS, so we could never get that setup. 2 stars for it failing just over 3 months, too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer inaudible defect
customer_reviews.text: The subwoofer is inaudible. Yamaha support is nonresponsive and had wait times exceeding 1 hour. I also have the YAS 207 which had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Not a good soundbar purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sound any better than the TV really. It's slow. Couldn't setup Alexa. I made a rush purchase and should have taken more time with it. I've been watching Dark on Netflix and while that show is good, i wish I could go to Winden, go back to 1986, wait 33 years, and not purchase this soundbar again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Stein

customer_reviews.title: If big on alexa dont bother
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this because of the Alexa built in capability. It does not "connect" properly, the alexa skill is useless and the Yamaha app is elementary. I must admit sound quality is great! I use the digital optical cable option.... going to see if hdmi makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality no bueno.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality didnt live up to expectations. My old Vizio bar sounded way better!!
customer_reviews.author: NorCalBen33

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality easy phone app awkward packaging basic alexa ,echo dot is better
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Horrible service
customer_reviews.text: Super irritated with this. I just received my second one. The first one came with dammaged HDMI ports. Sent that back. And the new came came looked great and come to find out I have no power cords. So needless to say I have another papper weight. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Andres Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Sound bar shuts off by itself
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work ok for a while. We have used now for about 3 months. Lately we have noticed the sound will change and the sound bar just shuts off on its own. We have to then manually hit the on/off button to make it work again. Very frustrating,

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded Sound for your TV
customer_reviews.text: Way better sound than what your tv produces. Clear voice enhancement is a nice touch. Surround sound, not so much.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the WiFi option
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding soundbar, but the don’t fork over for the WiFi option. The reason I got the YAS-209 was so I could play music over WiFi rather than Bluetooth. Trying to stream music through this soundbar is a complete pain and end up having to stream through my TV instead. Just go with the YAS-207 you’ll save more money and have the exact same sound.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t meet the expectations!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Soundbar - Even without Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Sonos One w/ Alexa in my Living Room where the sound bar is and it was kind of complicated to keep them from interfering with one another. In the end I just turned off Alexa on the sound bar.
